title: The Hero of Ages: Mistborn Audiobook 3
description:
The Hero of Ages is the final book of the first Mistborn trilogy. This is it's audiobook version from Audible. 
I have aditionaly broken four big sound files into chapters and I have set their tags and properties correctly so they form an album. Now they are much more practical for portable devices than those huge *.aa files.

Note that if you want the audiobook badly and have no problem playing *.aa files on your portable device you shouild get it off Audible, especially since they offer a free audiobook of your choosing during your demo period.
This torrent has been uploaded more because I'm annoyed by Audible and it's *.aa format and me not being able to easily split it into managable chunks. Also it only works on a limited range of platforms.

Anyway enjoy. I found listening to Auidiobooks to be delightfull while playing games into the background, especially if you have allready read the book.
